Faction Fighters combines the tactical hand management of a trick-taking game with the customizable card battling of a TCG. The result is a super approachable 2-player card battling adventure! Timing is everything as you bluff or bolster your way to victory! This demo teaches you how to play the game with the Starfall fields area deck.

The full game includes deck drafting, 15 different Factions, and 4 area decks- each with unique strategies to explore.

Check out the physical game on Kickstarter: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/thunderfinchgames/faction-fighters-2-player...
